availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Ireland. Married to Sarah Hillock Mitcheltree in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in June 1811. Resident of Nicholas County in 1820. Resident of Nicholas County in 1830. Resident of Nicholas County in 1840. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Fourth Manuscript Census of the United States(1820), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 112.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 411.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #000252394.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Nicholas County Administrators Bonds, February-1864, p. 103.
